With #Predator 9.0 HS, GPS Recycling has redefined #industry standards. No one has ever built a #baler of this size, and its #power is incomparable.

Designed to handle the #bulkiest #loads, the Predator 9.0 HS delivers outstanding performance at every stage of the process.

-Large loading chamber to handle large volumes quickly.
-Unmatched compaction power, ideal for those who need high performance.
With this machine you can maximize your company's #productivity, contact us!
https://lnkd.in/d9wYEUX5

ğŸš€ The #Destroyer represents the ultimate solution for large-scale scrap processing. Designed with an extraordinary loading capacity and a #closingforce on lids greater than that of any conventional shear, this machine offers unparalleled performance.

-Box over 9 meters long and an open loading area of 2.8 meters, ideal for bulky materials.
-State-of-the-art hydraulic power plant for maximum production efficiency.
-Increased productivity and reduced operating costs all in one.
If your business needs #superior performance, Destroyer is the answer.
Find out more on our website

ğŸ”§ #GPSRecycling is proud to continue the path of #innovation traced by Lollini International, a pioneer in the design of the first mobile scrap processing machines in Italy.

If you own a Lollini machine, you can count on us for service and genuine #spare parts to ensure that your operations remain efficient and uninterrupted.

In addition, we offer the option of picking up your Lollini model in #tradein, so you can upgrade to a more modern, efficient and technologically advanced solution. ğŸ’ª
